law.catch_line: The initial term of registration as an apprentice barber is 2 years....

section.section: The initial term of registration as an apprentice barber is 2 years.
An apprentice barber may renew the apprentice barber registration one time.

text.section: The one-time renewal of an apprentice barber registration expires on the date set by the Board.

At least 1 month before registration as an apprentice barber expires, the Board shall mail to the apprentice barber, at the last known address of the apprentice barber:
a renewal application form; and
a notice that states:
the date on which the current registration as an apprentice barber expires;
the date by which the Board must receive the renewal application for the renewal to be approved, issued, and mailed before the registration expires; and
the amount of the renewal fee.

Before the registration of an individual expires, the individual may renew it for an additional term if the individual:
otherwise is entitled to be registered;
pays to the Board a renewal fee established by the Board in accordance with § 4-206 of this title; and
submits to the Board a renewal application on the form that the Board provides.
The Board shall renew the apprentice barber registration of and issue a renewal certificate to each apprentice barber who meets the requirements of this section.
